data.name: Snakeskin Armor
data.description: Armor crafted from supple snakeskin. Enhances air magic and wisdom while providing excellent protection.

effects.description: Adds 150 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 22% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 10% Air Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 50 Initiative to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30 Wisdom to its stats when equipped. Each point of wisdom increases your xp in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 wisdom)

data.name: Cyclops Eye
data.description: A giant, unblinking eye with a faint magical glow. Useful for powerful artifacts.
